bug.short_desc: Statistical and CBE Data Managers should be packaged as separate wars

long_desc.thetext: The statistical data manager and cbe data managers implemented under Bug #200275 should be packaged as separate war files. Further instructions will be provided to determine the files involved.
Changing the priority of this bug since this is required for the i8 end2end.
can you provide further instructions for this bug, to start working.

Statistical and CBE Data Managers are already packaged as osgi bundles under the cosmos-demo in latest build. Please let me know, if it is ok.
If yes please verify and close this bug.
The stat and logging data managers are packaged in the build as OSGi bundles.

As of TPTP 4.6.0, TPTP is in maintenance mode and focusing on improving quality by resolving relevant enhancements/defects and increasing test coverage through test creation, automation, Build Verification Tests (BVTs), and expanded run-time execution. As part of the TPTP Bugzilla housecleaning process (see http://wiki.eclipse.org/Bugzilla_Housecleaning_Processes), this enhancement/defect is verified/closed by the Project Lead since this originator of this enhancement/defect has an inactive Bugzilla account and considered to be fixed. If this enhancement/defect is still unresolved and reproducible in the latest TPTP release (http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/home/downloads/), please re-open.
